entry.em: ..EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING

entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
